original_title: Panic! at the Disco: Live in Denver
overview: A concert documentary following Panic! at the Disco during their performance in Denver, Colorado for their headline tour after the release of their debut album, 'A Fever You Can't Sweat Out' in 2005.
tagline: Ladies and gentlemen, we proudly present, a picturesque score of passing fantasy.
title: Panic! at the Disco: Live in Denver
